description:
Established in 2004, Proton is a Precision Component Manufacturing company in Pune.

Over 15 years of experience, Proton has established itself as a leading supplier of Machined Castings, Forgings and Bar components to OEM’s and Tier 1 suppliers all over the world.

Proton is specialized in manufacturing Critical Machined components for all Industrial sectors from Automobile, Oil & Gas, Food, Power, Locomotives, General Engineering, Pneumatics, Defence & Aerospace.
Proton is certified with AS9100: Rev D  for supplying Precision Machined components & Assemblies for Defence & Aerospace Industries and ISO9001:2015 for all Engineering sectors.
Proton has a core competency of developing strong manufacturing processes which enable to handle mass quantity as well as small batch quantities.
Proton is a team of 60 employees, 25 CNC/VMC/Multiaxis machines which enable to cater to critical precision machined components.

hq.line_1: Plot No 27 , Tiny Industrial Co-operative Estate , Kondhwa Bk,

updates.text:
Performance awards for the month of February 24 & birthday celebrations.
Every month we celebrate,  congratulate and award the best performers of Previous month on 1st working day of the month and celebrate birthdays of everyone together for the previous month. we have been doing this for past 20 years and are very Proud of the culture we inculcate in our whole team with these appreciations.
our team is highly motivated to serve our Customers with top notch service and happy smiling faces 😊.
Manufacturing for future of India.
#makeinindia #defencemanufacturing
#aerospacemanufacturing #globalsourcing #automotiveindustry #cncmachining #5axismachining #telecominfrastructure

Mistake realization for the month of February 2024.
The production team explains the mistakes that took in Production to whole Proton Team so that others learn from their mistakes to avoid them in Future.
This is a ritual and a regular practice at Proton towards continuous improvements in our Production System to ensure defect free supplies to all our Customers. 
#manufacturingexcellence #defenceindustry #cncmachining #advancedmanufacturing

Session on "Harmony in Relations"  was organized for the staff at Proton Metalcrafts Pvt Ltd on 20-Feb-24.
Thanks to Gajanan Lupane for arranging this session for the staff.

Performance awards for the month of February 24 & birthday celebrations.
Every month we celebrate,  congratulate and award the best performers of Previous month on 1st working day of the month and celebrate birthdays of everyone together for the previous month. we have been doing this for past 20 years and are very Proud of the culture we inculcate in our whole team with these appreciations.
our team is highly motivated to serve our Customers with top notch service and happy smiling faces 😊.
